Recent Thoughts

A Strange Time to Celebrate America

Today, I don't feel like celebrating America. Today, our nation is still separated over an issue that was supposed to have been resolved over 150 years ago. Today, I am supposed to celebrate a nation that still cannot agree that black lives matter as much as white lives.
